thread.title: OMG! Amazing!
thread.title_full: OMG! Amazing! - Review of NUO Hotel Beijing, Beijing, China - TripAdvisor

author: anastasiia191
title: OMG! Amazing!
text: I spent one night in February with my boyfriend in NUO Hotel. He organized a surprise evening of romance and it was just amazing. We stayed in a Parkview Studio, the room was so beautiful and so unique with an amazing view. The room amenities were a delight but the surprise celebration cake and flowers the perfect touch. Thank you NUO Hotel for making this night unforgettable!! and thank you to the Lifestyle Manager who assisted with the whole surprise set up! I will definitely recommend this Hotel to my family and friends when they come visit!
